articles.description: During President Joe Biden's CNN town hall, he made several false statistical claims. Here's what you need to know.

articles.title: Keilar dissects Cruz's 'bogus journey'
articles.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar breaks down the controversy surrounding Sen. Ted Cruz's family trip to Cancun, Mexico, while his home state suffered massive power outages and freezing temperatures.

articles.title: Opinion: Some days are diamonds, even though she's gone

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Incredible new images shared by Perseverance rover after Mars landing
articles.description: After safely landing on the surface of Mars Thursday, NASA's Perseverance rover has sent back a never-before-seen view: what it looks like to land on Mars. The rover also returned some new color images of its landing site.

articles.author: Daniella Diaz and Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: While Cruz was traveling from Cancun, O'Rourke and AOC helped Texans in crisis
articles.description: While Sen. Ted Cruz was dealing with the fallout from his trip to Cancun, two of his Democratic political nemeses -- Beto O'Rourke and Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez -- raised money and offered resources to Texans hit hard by this week's winter storm.

articles.title: Sen. Ted Cruz admits Cancun trip was 'a mistake'
articles.description: Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX), in an exclusive interview with KTRK ABC13 Houston, admits that his trip to Cancun, Mexico, was a mistake. CNN's Abby Phillip reacts to Cruz's statements.

articles.title: How Chile became a leader in Covid-19 vaccination
articles.description: Chile now has the fifth highest vaccination rate per capita in the world after Israel (79.48), the United Arab Emirates (53.43), the United Kingdom (24.3) and the United States (17.00).

articles.title: Biden may travel to Texas next week in wake of devastating storms
articles.description: President Joe Biden said on Friday that he plans to travel to Texas but does not want a presidential trip to put any additional strain on a state grappling with an extreme weather crisis.

articles.author: Anna Bahney, CNN Business
articles.title: Buyers have to act fact in this tough housing market
articles.description: Buyers looking for a home right now need to be ready to pounce. Inventory of homes is so low that, in January, homes sold in half the time they did a year ago.

articles.title: 'America is back': Biden affirms transatlantic relationships
articles.description: Seeking a sharp break from the "America First" policies of his predecessor, President Joe Biden reaffirmed the US position of global leadership, the power of its alliances and the resilience of democracy in the United States and abroad.

articles.title: Almost a third of people with 'mild' Covid-19 still battle symptoms months later, study finds

articles.title: Missing princess 'being cared for at home,' Dubai royal family says
articles.description: Dubai's royal family says Princess Latifa is "being cared for at home," dismissing videos in which she accused them of holding her hostage since she attempted to flee abroad in 2018.

articles.author: Kelly Mena, CNN
articles.title: Advocates say new Georgia GOP voting bill targets Black voters
articles.description: Georgia voting rights groups are denouncing a sweeping voting bill introduced this week by Republican state legislators as a "direct attack on democracy" and on Black voters.

articles.title: Houston hospitals make tough choices during deadly winter storm
articles.description: From bursting pipes to delays for dialysis patients whose treatment can wait, a pair of Houston community hospitals Friday struggled with water and power woes stemming from freezing temperatures and winter storms.

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: Copper prices are soaring. Here's why that's good news for the recovery
articles.description: Copper prices climbed to their highest level in nearly a decade Friday as investors in the commodity anticipate rising demand for infrastructure and construction projects in the post-pandemic economy.
